name: prsspw
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wss(cpr(c0, c1), cpw(c2)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wss(cpr(c0, c1), cpw(c2)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wss(cpr(c0, c1), cpw(c2)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wss(cpr(c0, c1), cpw(c2)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wss(cpr(c0, c1), cpw(c2)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wss(cpr(c0, c1), cpw(c2)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wss(cpr(c0, c1), cpw(c2)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wss(cpr(c0, c1), cpw(c2)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: An unordered pair belongs to the power class of a class iff each member belongs to the class. (Contributed by NM, 10-Dec-2003.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 25-Mar-2020.)
